tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_performance_data (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    network_speed INT,
    latency INT,
    packet_loss_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    install_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    cpu_utilization FLOAT,
    memory_utilization FLOAT,
    storage_utilization FLOAT,
    network_traffic FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_device_id FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255),
  ip_address VARCHAR(15),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  last_modified TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  metric_name VARCHAR(50),
  metric_value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(id)
);

CREATE TABLE bottlenecks (
  bottleneck_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  bottleneck_description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(id)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    cpu_usage FLOAT,
    memory_usage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    last_update TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE device_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    cpu_utilization FLOAT,
    memory_utilization FLOAT,
    network_utilization FLOAT,
    storage_utilization FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
    traffic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    data_size INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
)

CREATE TABLE network_errors (
    error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    error_message VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
)

CREATE TABLE network_bottlenecks (
    bottleneck_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    bottleneck_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
)
